name: Category Page Content For Woocommerce
author: Shehab Mahamud

sections.description:
This plugin will help you to put content on your woocommerce product category page for SEO purposes.Add a new post and put content and also select the category

Plugin Documentation: https://wordpress.org/plugins/category-page-content-for-woocommerce

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload category-page-content-for-woocommerce.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do I need to setup anything?

After installing this plugin, install woocommerce if not installed and then go to setting page and save whatever you want
